kanji-not-in-list: Kanji is not in your list
removed-kanji: Removed kanji ``%kanji%`` from your kanji list. ``%kanji-count%`` kanjis are in your list.
kanji-already-in-list: Kanji is already in your list.
added-kanji-to-list: Added kanji ``%kanji%`` to kanji list of <@%user-id%>, which contains ``%kanji-count%`` kanji.
